members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
NewRecordEditMode is true when editing or viewing a record that was just inserted in insert mode. This record is not necessarily part of the search result set and therefore the record pager cannot be used correctly.
[Administrator] 2/27/2007 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Determines whether a display type requires the creation of a client side instance.
Override this property in an inherited class. Return true if the display type requires the creation of a client side instance in order to run initialization scripts. A client side instance is created regardless for all display types when needed for client side functionality like expressions.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the file name for the client side script to be included for this display type.
This property returns the file name only, excluding the directory path. Use the ClientSideScriptDirectory property to override the default directory for script files.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns the default directory for display type script files.
The default is [WebSiteRoot]/m4nClientScripts/DisplayTypes.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns a comma-separated list of events of the "From" control in range search to attach to when copying the value to the "To" control.
i.e. "onchange,onpropertychange,onmouseover". The "onchange" event is the default. Override this property in a display type if its value changes without trigerring the onchange event.
[Administrator] 10/7/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Sets the value of the display type to the current default value.
Override this method if a display type requires setting the value in a different manner.
[Administrator] 10/8/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Returns a client side script to run for each instance of the display type.
Override this method and return a script to be rendered after the display type.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Registers a script that adds the name of the client side class of the display type to the m4nDisplayTypeInformation instance.
The main purpose of the m4nDisplayTypeInformation class is to maintain mapping between server side classes and client side classes. This is a sample of the script this method might register: m4nDisplayTypeInfo.add("Made4Net.WebControls.DisplayTypes.NumericTextBox", "ClientSideClass", "m4nNumericTextBox");
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Registers script blocks required by a display type
Override this method in an inherited class to register all client script blocks that are required for the operation of the display type.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Retunrs a script that initializes an instance of m4nDisplayTypeInformation.
The main purpose of the m4nDisplayTypeInformation class is to maintain mapping between server side classes and client side classes.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Retunrs the name of the client side instance of the m4nDisplayTypeInformation class.
The main purpose of the m4nDisplayTypeInformation class is to maintain mapping between server side classes and client side classes.
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Registeres a client side script include file as a script block.
The unique name of the script block. The directory where the script resides. The file name of the script to include
This method registeres a script include file. i.e. .
[Administrator] 7/17/2005 Created
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:Made4Net.WebControls.IJSCustomValidation
member.summary: Interface which is implemented by Control which provide custom client side javascript code insertion.

members.member: Encrption of password coming from user so it will be saved to database in its encrypted form
